creditline: Gift of Vanessa Laird and Timothy Raylor
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: front and back panels from a disassembled apron; both panels are black with pink ribbon trim and black fringe at bottom edge; a (front panel): black velvet panel with asymmetrical multicolored floral spray design with three large striped leaves at bottom center; black felt panel at top; beaded section backed with black satin; b (back panel): black wool felt
dimension:
15 5/16 × 13 3/8 in. (38.89 × 33.97 cm) (object part, a, front panel--without fringe)
19 × 13 1/2 in. (48.26 × 34.29 cm) (object part, b, back panel--without fringe)
medium: Beads, velvet, ribbon, satin (?), wool felt, synthetic fibers
title: Two apron panels, from a three-piece set
